overview: Following on from this label's previous Neil Young DVD documentary, The First Decade, comes this second instalment focusing on the great man's career between the years 1976 and 2006 with the help of obscure archive footage, rare film of Neil Young in performance and in the studio and contributions from those he worked with closely during this period.
tagline: INFORMATION  Production companySmokin GenreMusic Released2006 Age ratingUnknown
title: Neil Young: Three More Decades
